# Measures

{{< include _setup.qmd >}}

```{r}
#| include: false

requireNamespace("mlr3verse")
```

Measures operate on `r ref("Prediction")` objects generated by learners.
They quantify the prediction by comparing prediction with ground truth.
The `r ref("Measure")` objects provide an abstraction for a plethora of performance measures.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| column: page

content = as.data.table(mlr3::mlr_measures)[, .(key, label, task_type, packages)]
content[is.na(task_type), task_type := "generic"]
content[, packages := map(packages, function(value) setdiff(value, c("mlr3", "mlr3measures")))]

ref_cell = function(value) {
  if (!length(value)) return(NULL)
  mlr3website::ref(sprintf("%s_%s", "mlr_measures", value), text = value, format = "htmltools")
}

reactable(content, columns = list(
    key = colDef(name = "Key", cell = ref_cell),
    label = colDef(name = "Label", minWidth = 200),
    packages = colDef(name = "Packages", cell = package_list_cell),
    task_type = colDef(name = "Task Type")
  ),
  searchable = TRUE,
  pagination = FALSE,
  highlight = TRUE
)
```
